name: Emergency Christian Ministries
description: Emergency Christian Ministries is a non-profit organization located in Williamsburg, Kentucky that provides emergency services reflecting the command of Jesus to 'Love your neighbor as yourself.' The organization offers food distribution, shelter services, and other emergency assistance to individuals and families in need in the Williamsburg and surrounding areas.
source: Verified from official Emergency Christian Ministries Facebook page and multiple online directories
services: Emergency services, food distribution, shelter services, community assistance
notes: Phone number corrected from incorrect number in database. Organization provides comprehensive emergency services including food distribution and shelter assistance. Also operates a food distribution center at the same address.
